roles.title: Director of Sales Development, North America

positions.title:
Title
Sales Development Manager, NA
positions.description:
MongoDB is the next-generation database that helps businesses transform their industries by harnessing the power of data. The world’s most sophisticated organizations, from cutting-edge startups to the largest companies, use MongoDB to create applications never before possible at a fraction of the cost of legacy databases. MongoDB is the fastest-growing database ecosystem, with over 9 million downloads, thousands of customers, and over 1,000 technology and service partners. Learn more at www.mongodb.com.

• 11 Million+ downloads growing to the 4th most popular database worldwide
• 172% growth in popularity in the last 20 months
• The only non-relational database in the top 5, 2.5x ahead of the nearest NoSQL alternative
• On Wall Street Journal’s Billion Dollar Startup Club
• #27 on CNBC’s 2015 Disruptor 50 list
• On Businessinsider.com 2015 Best Startup to work for in America list

Excellence Club - 2018

given.text:
Gigi always loves to push the boundaries of herself, her team, and those around her to achieve more than what's asked for. That is what makes her a special kind of leader. I loved being on her team because she knew when to give advice, and when to give direction based on each of her team member's individual needs. She easily identified peoples strengths and weaknesses, and played to those making it very easy and rewarding to work with her. I would recommend those starting in sales, or veteran sales leaders to have her as a role model!
…
See more

I worked for Gigi as both a rep and team lead. She is a fantastic manager, was dedicated to my success, and tailored her management approach to both my strengths and weaknesses. Anyone under Gigi’s leadership will build a solid sales foundation that will set them up for the rest of the career. Gigi is personable, trustworthy, and will champion her top performers across the organization. For those that are eager to take their career in sales to the next level - Gigi’s team is the right start.
…
See more

I had the privilege to report to Gigi while working at Mondo, it was truly the best opportunity I had while working there. Not only did she make me feel confident in my abilities as an Account Director, she helped me refine and learn new skills that would empower me to maximize my success during my tenure. This was my first sales role in my career; Gigi re-defined what a sales person meant and allowed me to see the self-gratification of my achievements -- what you put into your position is truly what you will get out of it. Gigi is a natural. She sees a need and is able to clearly define a solution, and has the patience to work with her team on how to get there. Gigi and I built a friendship outside of our working relationship -- I respected her ability to keep business as business and not allow that to interfere with any outside engagements. She made me feel rewarded and accomplished throughout my successes, and offered the right type of criticism and feedback when she noticed my areas of weakness. I would work with and for her any day!
…
See more

I directly worked for Gigi for more than a year. She is a phenomenal leader that takes great pride in investing in her employees and consistently pushing them to grow. Additionally, she always came with valuable new insights and ideas in order to help support both my future career trajectory and my success in her organization. I am deeply grateful for my time working with Gigi. Her vision for her team and her excellent leadership truly set her apart as an outstanding director.
…
See more

received.text: I had the pleasure of managing Ayan directly for a year when he first joined MongoDB. He was new to sales when he came on but due to his drive, maturity, intelligence and desire to both learn and teach those around him he quickly became a top performer and leader amongst his peers. During his time on my team I watched him move through 3 different roles, all with a high level of ambiguity, and excel in each due to his adaptability and keen problem solving skills. My advice to anyone who has the opportunity to work with Ayan, whether a customer or employer, jump on it!

I had the immense pleasure of managing Alice both as a rep and then team lead during the start of her career at Mongo. Her drive is second to none. Combine that with her genuine passion for sales process and disruptive technologies, and she is nothing short of a force to be reckoned with. Beyond this, Alice proved on many occasions her willingness to lean into uncomfortable situations and embrace critical feedback allowing her to be a stabilizing force amongst her peers. Anyone would be lucky to have Alice on their team.
